jyutpinyin: nei5 di1 zung1 man4 hok6 sing4 dim2 aa3
translation-en: How is your Chinese learning going?

cantonese: 你想食法國嘢，日本嘢定係中國嘢？
jyutpinyin: nei5 soeng2 sik6 faat3 gwok3 je5 jat6 bun2 je5 ding6 hai6 zung1 gwok3 je5
translation-en: Do you want to eat French  Japanese  or Chinese food?

cantonese: 你叫咩名？你叫乜嘢名呀？
jyutpinyin: nei5 giu3 me1 meng2 nei5 giu3 mat1 je5 meng2 aa3

cantonese: 你點呀？ 你最近幾好嗎？
jyutpinyin: nei5 dim2 aa3 nei5 zeoi3 gan6 gei2 hou2 maa1
translation-en: How are you? How have you been lately?

cantonese: 你喺邊度住呀？ 你住喺倫敦邊到㗎？
jyutpinyin: nei5 hai2 bin1 dou6 zyu6 aa3 nei5 zyu6 hai2 leon4 deon1 bin1 dou6 gaa3
translation-en: Where do you live? Where in London do you live?

cantonese: 你識唔識講英文㗎？ 你識講廣東話咩？
jyutpinyin: nei5 sik1 m4 sik1 gong2 jing1 man4 gaa3 nei5 sik1 gong2 gwong2 dung1 waa2 me1
translation-en: Do you speak English? Can you speak Cantonese?

jyutpinyin: haa6 tin1 gwo3 sing4 dim2 aa3

cantonese: 今日幾多號？今日星期幾？
jyutpinyin: gam1 jat6 gei2 do1 hou6 gam1 jat6 sing1 kei4 gei2
translation-en: What's the date today? What day of the week is it?

cantonese: 而家幾點鐘呀？ 而家幾多點呀？ 你知唔知而家幾多點呀？
jyutpinyin: ji4 gaa1 gei2 dim2 zung1 aa3 ji4 gaa1 gei2 do1 dim2 aa3 nei5 zi1 m4 zi1 ji4 gaa1 gei2 do1 dim2 aa3
translation-en: What time is it now? Do you know what time it is?

jyutpinyin: nei5 hai2 leon4 deon1 zyu6 zo2 gei2 noi6 aa3
translation-en: How long have you been living in London?

cantonese: 返工返成點呀？ 學得點呀？
jyutpinyin: faan1 gung1 faan1 sing4 dim2 aa3 hok6 dak1 dim2 aa3
translation-en: How is work? How is school?

jyutpinyin: nei5 jau5 mou5 heoi3 gwo3 zung1 gwok3 aa3
translation-en: Have you ever been to China?

cantonese: 你鍾唔鍾意食中國嘢㗎？
jyutpinyin: nei5 zung1 m4 zung1 ji3 sik6 zung1 gwok3 je5 gaa3
translation-en: Do you like eating Chinese food?

jyutpinyin: nei5 zeoi3 gan6 mong4 m4 mong4 aa3

cantonese: 你識唔識讀呢個漢字呀？
jyutpinyin: nei5 sik1 m4 sik1 duk6 ni1 go3 hon3 zi6 aa3
translation-en: Can you read this Chinese character?
